Visit all the dollhouse rooms in this Grand Hotel and other locations like Restaurant, Lobby, Rooms, and Playroom for kids with Pirate ship and let the doorman show you how the elevator works. This resort offers endless opportunities to create your own vacation hotel stories!

MY TOWN HOTEL GAMES FEATURE:

•	7 locations to explore: Lobby, Rooms, Restaurant...
•	Meet Hotel staff, Family with kids and other guests
•	Customize characters in many outfits
•	Discover a Pirate Ship in the Playroom for kids
•	Many Themed Rooms: Pink room, Safari room, Family room ...
•	Get some snacks in the hotel Restaurant
•	Clean the guest room
•	Enjoy, relax and for fun!
•	Bring other characters to the Grand Hotel

BE A DOORMAN, RECEPTIONIST OR ENJOY AS A GUEST!

You can roleplay with all dollhouse characters and create your own hotel story. Our Hotel games allow you to dress up all your dolls and make the vacation stories you want! Be a Grand Hotel Doorman, take a trolley with bags to the room, or dress up the entire family in the resort outfit. Visit the swimming pool and Playroom! Our Family Hotel Playroom is perfect for small kids to play mini-games and meet pirates and their pirate ships. Our Grand Hotel is not like other hotels; it is all about you here!

CHECK ALL ROOMS IN THIS GAME: 

•	PINK ROOM
See a Grand Hotel Pink room. A fantastic resort hotel room with heart-shaped furniture. This will be a favorite room for girls!

•	SAFARI ROOM
Tell the Doorman to take the trolley with bags to this fantastic resort suite. Experience Africa once you enter the room. Check animal pattern bedding or a green wall! Both girls and boys will love it very much!

•	FAMILY ROOM
Unpack the suitcases you brought on the vacation and relax with your family. Find a big wardrobe to play dress-up games for kids all day! Big resort room perfect for parents with kids! Enjoy in this family hotel where you can create cool stories.

•	MY TOWN RESTAURANT
Go to My Town Restaurant and eat cookies, pasta, crab, sandwiches, and drink delicious juice. The best restaurant you've ever been to!

•	SWIMMING POOL
Visit a pool and relax! Swim, order drinks and enjoy your vacation! Download the game today and see why My Town games are the best dollhouse games in the world! 

RECOMMENDED AGE GROUP
Our hotel game is perfect for kids 4-12. The game is safe even when parents are out of the room.
